meanings.definition: An expression of praise or admiration.
meanings.sent1: She blushed when she received a compliment on her artwork.
meanings.sent2: He always appreciates a sincere compliment on his cooking skills.
meanings.sent3: The compliment from her boss made her day brighter.
meanings.sent4: His compliment was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt compliment lingered in her mind long after it was given.

meanings.definition: To express admiration or praise for someone.
meanings.sent1: She will compliment her friend on the beautiful garden.
meanings.sent2: It's important to compliment others for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: He decided to compliment the chef on the delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: Her words of compliment lifted his spirits.
meanings.sent5: They complimented each other's outfits before the party.

meanings.definition: Something that completes or enhances something else.
meanings.sent1: The new curtains were the perfect compliment to the room's decor.
meanings.sent2: The side dish was a great compliment to the main course.
meanings.sent3: The dessert was a sweet compliment to the savory meal.
meanings.sent4: The music was a beautiful compliment to the evening's ambiance.
meanings.sent5: The painting served as a lovely compliment to the furniture.
